open_readme.label: üì∞ Open the README
open_readme.tooltip: Click here to view the script's documentation.

open_words.label: ‚úè Edit words list
open_words.tooltip: Click here to edit the words list

open_ui_folder.label: üìÅ Open UI folder
open_ui_folder.tooltip: Click here to open the UI/Overlay folder

cmd_play.label:
Remember to save the settings!

Command: start a game
cmd_play.tooltip: Command to start a new hangman game

p_mod.label: Permission: start a game
p_mod.tooltip: Only users with this permission can start a new game

n_tries_per_10_letters.label:
Number: tries per 10 letters
 * For example a value of 10 gives 1 chance per letter, a value of 20 gives 2 chances per letter, etc.
n_tries_per_10_letters.tooltip: Amount of errors they can acummulate

cmd_guessword.label: Command: guess the word
cmd_guessword.tooltip: Command to guess the entire word

n_guess_cd.label: Number: user cooldown in seconds
n_guess_cd.tooltip: Prevent guess spamming with this cooldown

n_letter_cost.label: Number: letter command cost
n_letter_cost.tooltip: Spend these points when guessing a letter

n_word_cost.label: Number: Word command cost
n_word_cost.tooltip: Warning: sometimes this command does not make sense to use

n_letter_prize.label: Number: Points amount for each letter guessed
n_letter_prize.tooltip: Give this amount time the amount of letters found

msg_game_started.value: Hangman started: $word, guess a letter with $lettercmd ($lettercost $currency) or a word with $wordcmd ($wordcost $currency)
msg_game_started.label:
Game started
  $word - hidden word
  $lettercmd - letter command
  $lettercost - letter cost
  $wordcmd - word command
  $cordcost - word command cost
  $currency - currency name

msg_letter_found.label:
Letter guessed correctly
  $letter - guessed letter
  $times - how many times was the letter found
  $user - correct user
  $prize - prize
  $currency - currency name
msg_letter_found.tooltip: Shown when they use the letter command and guess correctly

msg_word_guessed.value: üéâüéâ $user guessed "$word" correctly! They get $prize $currency for the last $letters letters!
msg_word_guessed.label:
Word guessed correctly
  $user - correct user
  $word -- main word
  $prize - prize
  $currency - currency name
  $letters - amount of letters left
msg_word_guessed.tooltip: When someone guesses the entire word correctly

msg_cd.value: $command is on cooldown for $user, wait $remaining seconds!
msg_cd.label:
Cooldown message
  $command - command in cooldown
  $user - username
  $remaining - number of seconds remaining
msg_cd.tooltip: Message shown when the user guesses a letter that is not in the main word

msg_letter_not_in_word.value: The letter $letter is not in the word :(
msg_letter_not_in_word.label:
Letter guessed incorrectly
  $letter - guessed letter
msg_letter_not_in_word.tooltip: Message shown when the user guesses a letter that is not in the main word

msg_word_guessed_wrong.label:
Word guessed incorrectly
  $word - guessed word
msg_word_guessed_wrong.tooltip: Message shown when the user guesses a word but they failed

msg_no_permission.value: You don't have permission to use this command!
msg_no_permission.label: Not enough permissions
msg_no_permission.tooltip: If an user with insufficient permissions tries to start a game, show this message

msg_not_enough_points.label:
Not enough points
  $currency - currency name
msg_not_enough_points.tooltip: Shown when the user can't use a command because of low points

msg_game_running.label: Not enough points
msg_game_running.tooltip: Shown when the user can't use a command because of low points

msg_max_tries_reached.value: Max tries reached! The word was "$word"
msg_max_tries_reached.label:
Max tries reached
  $word - main word
msg_max_tries_reached.tooltip: When they guess incorrectly the maximum amount allowed, show this message

msg_letter_already_guessed.label:
Letter repeated
  $letter - guessed letter
msg_letter_already_guessed.tooltip: If someone tries an already submitted letter, show this message

msg_no_game_running.value: There is no game running at the moment!
msg_no_game_running.label: No game running
msg_no_game_running.tooltip: If someone tries to guess without a running game

msg_usage_guess.label:
Letter guess command usage
  $command - letter command
msg_usage_guess.tooltip: Show the correct usage of this command

msg_usage_guessword.label:
Word guess command usage
  $command - word command
msg_usage_guessword.tooltip: Show the correct usage of this command

msg_win.value: Congrats! $user defused the bomb and won $prize $currency
msg_win.label:
User wins
  $user - winning user
  $prize - amount of points
  $currency - currency name
msg_win.tooltip: When the user cuts the correct wire he wins and shows this message

msg_retry.value: This wire does nothing, try again
msg_retry.label: User cut a dummy wire
msg_retry.tooltip: If a user cuts a wire that is not connected, the user can try again

msg_bomb_exploded.label: Bomb explode
msg_bomb_exploded.tooltip: No more tries, bomb wnt off!

msg_already_planted.value: You already have a bomb! Defuse it!
msg_already_planted.label: User tries to plant again
msg_already_planted.tooltip: If the user tries to plant another bomb say this message

msg_cant_cut.value: Can't cut imaginary wires! Do $command to plant a bomb!
msg_cant_cut.label:
User tries to cut without a bomb
  $command - command to plant
msg_cant_cut.tooltip: If the user tries to cut without a bomb show this message

msg_wrong_color.label: User cuts non-existing wire
msg_wrong_color.tooltip: If the user cuts an non-existing wire like brown or purple show this message

msg_usage.label: User doesn't specify a color
msg_usage.tooltip: If the user doesn't specify a color when cutting a wire send this message
